subSections.title: Readings
Prefix
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* An expression prefixed with {{lang|ja|以}} means "from this reference point, and more". It can only be translated upon contexts. The reference point can be understood as "now", "here", "this", or aforementioned.
**{{ja-r|以%上|い%じょう}}: "or more/higher/above"; literally "from this point, and anything more/higher/above"
**{{ja-r|以%下|い%か}}: "or less/lower/below"; literally "from this point, and anything less/lower/below"
**{{ja-r|以%内|い%ない}}: "within"; literally "from this range, and anything within"
**{{ja-r|以%外|い%がい}}: "outside, other than"; literally "from this range, and anything outside"
**{{ja-r|以%前|い%ぜん}}: "ago"; literally "from this point, and anything before"
**{{ja-r|以%後|い%ご}}: "later; ever since"; literally "from this point, and anything later"
